name: Lifespan Budget
description: Lifespan Budget is a game where you try to survive. You got a short time to live but a way to get more lifetime wich is to buy it with money. This is why you are working all the time in a ore fabric to earn money. The fear of the death is forcing you to work and buy more lifetime. But time is not something that is infinite wich means time is getting after each buy more valuable. So valuable that someday you cant afford it anymore and the end is near.
